duties_responsibilities.duty: Unpacking and sorting returned products in the Complaint Investigations Lab.
Investigating returned products to resolve customer complaints regarding blood glucose meters, strips & sensors.
Documenting complaint investigations in the Complaint Handling System.
Using troubleshooting equipment such as multi-meters, oscilloscopes, test fixtures, and microscopes to complete investigations.

education_certification.credential: H.S. Diploma or equivalent (such as GED)
Associates (Two year) degree in Electrical Engineering or other Science
